traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: If a phlogiston bush is reduced to 0 or fewer hit points, it explodes in a concussive blast of fire in a 10-foot radius. All creatures within the area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The phlogiston bush makes two attacks with its tendrils.

actions.name: Tendrils
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 40 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage.
